                                                                    int count,
                                                                    float frameDuration)
        Loads the animation from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from
        count - how many frames are in the file
        frameDuration - how long each frame should be shown for in seconds
        Returns:
        the animation

      • loadAnimations

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation[] loadAnimations(java.lang.String file,
                                                                       int frameWidth,
                                                                       int frameHeight,
                                                                       float frameDuration)
        Loads a set of animations from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from
        frameWidth - the width of an individual frame
        frameHeight - the height of an individual frame
        frameDuration - the time (in seconds) each frame spends on screen.
        Returns:
        the animation
